room_title: Escape room "Devils vs Heels" by Escape Tactic in Charlotte
review: My friend and I did the Devils vs. Heels room against our teacher and it was super fun! All the puzzles were well thought out and it adds a fun twist to it in the end. Bree was our host and she was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Devils vs Heels" by Escape Tactic in Charlotte
review: I’ve done about 5 escape rooms in Charlotte, both as team building events with work and for fun with friends. Escape Tactic is by far the best one yet. We did Devils vs. Heels and each puzzle was so thoughtfully put together. The rooms are so well designed that it creates a true experience. The location is an added bonus, with breweries right across the street. I went with friends, and can’t wait to get my team out soon!

room_title: Escape room "Devils vs Heels" by Escape Tactic in Charlotte
review: We really enjoyed the Devils vs Heels room. It was a cool take on the escape room concept. We had some really cool and thoughtful clues to get through. Location next to Queen Park Social and Sugar Creek is also ideal. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Devils vs Heels" by Escape Tactic in Charlotte
review: Did Devils vs. Heels with some friends. Great rooms and our game host was fantastic. Best escape room experience we have had.

room_title: Escape room "Devils vs Heels" by Escape Tactic in Charlotte
review: Escape Tactic is amazing! We did the Devils vs. Heels room and it was a ton of fun. The room/concept was so well thought-out and the puzzles were incredibly fun and challenging.

room_title: Escape room "Devils vs Heels" by Escape Tactic in Charlotte
review: Heels vs Devils room was a ton of fun. Go with a group because it’s a competition among yourselves
